title: The Little Red Hen
description: The little red hen knows what she wants and is willing to work hard for it. But none of her friends seem interested in helping her make some yummy bread. Will she share with them when it's all done? Repetitive word patterns help young readers enjoy the outcome!
meta: baked, busy, chewing, flour, grind, harvest, plant, sleepy, wheat
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word said

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
